text: blog comments powered by Disqus More in Super Bowl LaDainian Tomlinson Q&A: What makes a Hall of Fame RB, being a finalist with Terrell Davis, more February 03, 2017, 6:19 pm LaDainian Tomlinson, the long-time Chargers great, played running back for 11 seasons, rushing for over 1,000 yards in each of his first eight years. We caught up with him for a Q&A ahead of Saturday’s Hall of Fame induction ceremony. Patriots vs. Falcons Super Bowl 51: Who has the edge in key matchups? February 05, 2017, 9:56 am Does Matt Ryan get his first ring and move into a select group of Super-winning quarterbacks or does Tom Brady solidify his case for the greatest of all-time with ring No. 5? February 02, 2017, 8:51 pm Super Bowl season is here, so is the “Heat Is On” DUI enforcement program. Will former Broncos assistant coach Richard Smith strike gold again — this time with Falcons? February 03, 2017, 1:22 pm HOUSTON — Coaches never apologize for having talent. Atlanta Falcons defensive coordinator Richard Smith isn’t about to start.
